traits.Leviathan Will: The hunter has advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that control its actions.
traits.Limited Amphibiousness: The hunter can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

actions.Multiattack: The hunter makes two attacks with its envenomed crossbow.
actions.Envenomed Crossbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12+1d4 + 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.
actions.Club: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
